alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Grand Valley; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 3:07AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong cold front will be moving through portions of southwestern Delta, central Montrose, central Mesa, southwestern Garfield and south central Rio Blanco Counties through 345 AM MST... At 305 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cold front with embedded thunderstorms 9 miles northwest of De Beque, or 28 miles northeast of Grand Junction, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Junction, Rifle, Delta, Orchard City, Palisade, Cedaredge, Olathe, Parachute, Nucla, Collbran, Naturita, De Beque, Mesa, Rio Blanco, Battlement Mesa, Cameo, Vancorum, Molina, Austin and Grand Mesa. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 24 and 91. U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 32 and 89. Colorado 13 between mile markers 1 and 36. Colorado 65 between mile markers 1 and 61. Colorado 90 between mile markers 20 and 86. Colorado 92 between mile markers 1 and 12. Colorado 141 near mile marker 57, between mile markers 61 and 79, and between mile markers 130 and 162. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
